jyVis
Class GlobalObjects

java.lang.Object
  jyVis.GlobalObjects

public class GlobalObjects
extends java.lang.Object

A globally accessable list of objects. Objects are never removed from this list during a session, so the index of an object never changes and can be relied upon for the duration of the session in which it was added.

Author:
Curran Kelleher

Constant Field Values
Constructor Detail

GlobalObjects

public GlobalObjects()
Method Detail

add

public static int add(java.lang.Object o)
Adds the specified Object to the list of global objects, and returns the index of that object in the list. For example, GlobalObjects.get(GlobalObjects.add(object)) will return object.

Parameters:
o - the Object to add to the global list
Returns:
the index of the object in the global list

get

public static java.lang.Object get(int i)
Gets the Object at the specified index in the global list.

Parameters:
i - the index of the Object
Returns:
the Object at the specified index

clear

public static void clear()
Clears the list of global objects. This will break anything that is referring to any global objects, so don't call it unless you want to break the system (such as in the case of replaying a session).
